reviewText: I was hoping to see, some connection  in Tenn. to my times riding the L&N railroads. Being from Nashville, TN my family road these rails enough to know conductors by their first names. The video itself was great, the steam engine in the video is much like the one I road on the Hichman & Obion railroad which connected in Bruceston, TN with the L&N in the late 1940's and early 1950's...
